title: Opening Procedures
description: Daily tasks to complete when opening the studio
step1_description: Arrive 15 minutes before first class and unlock all doors
step2_description: Turn on all interior and exterior lights

title: Closing Procedures
description: Daily tasks to complete when closing the studio
step1_description: Ensure all entry points are secured
step2_description: Turn off all interior lights except emergency lighting

title: Weekly Deep Clean
step1_description: Vacuum all carpeted areas and mop hard floors
step2_description: Deep clean all bathrooms including toilets and sinks
step3_description: Dust all shelves and high surfaces

title: Monthly Inventory
step1_description: Take inventory of all consumable supplies
step2_description: List items that need to be reordered
